name: No Space Mission
description:
No Space Mission is a Pointless Clicker game about scoring points (pun intended).

There are no screenshots because the game could just load faster than a regular image anyway.

Can't figure the game out? Just keep clicking randomly and increase your number, that's all!

Notes:

  • Might not work well in a phone
  • Sounds may not work as intended sometimes (You know, basic web game stuff)
